messages.content: Can you generate some ideas of things that you can do to help me accomplish my goals?

Based on your goals (Dialed Intelligence to $500k, Northwestern coursework, daily learning, shipping products), here are proactive tasks I can handle in the background: Content & Marketing, Client Pipeline & Sales, Learning & Research Support, Operations & Automation, Health & Productivity...
Can you switch the default model to Sonnet?
Done. Default model switched to Sonnet. Gateway restarting now. Pricing comparison: Opus: $15/$75 per M tokens (in/out), Sonnet: $3/$15 per M tokens. ~5x cheaper.
